name: spatialGE pathway enrichment
description: Execute spatially-informed pathway enrichment analysis using the spatialGE toolkit.

STEnrich.raw_counts.description: The input raw count matrix. Must be an integer-based table.
STEnrich.raw_counts.name: Count matrix:

STEnrich.coords_metadata.description: The coordinate metadata. This describes the physical location for each of the sampled points. The first column has the barcode values which should match the columns of the expression matrix. Columns 2 and 3 have the horizontal (x) and vertical (y) positions.
STEnrich.coords_metadata.name: Coordinate metadata:

STEnrich.normalization_method.description: We provide log or SCTransform (Seurat) based normalization. For more details on each, see the corresponding publications
STEnrich.normalization_method.name: Normalization method:

STEnrich.gene_set_database.description: The gene set database. Each database contains multiple sets of genes relevant to a pathway, biological function, or other process.
STEnrich.gene_set_database.name: Gene set database:

STEnrich.gene_id_choice.description: The type of identifier for the genes in your differential expression file. If it's the "common" name (like TP53, BCL2), then choose "Symbol".
STEnrich.gene_id_choice.name: Gene ID type:
